chapter.text: Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu Attaqu Rabbakum 'Inna Zalzalata As-Sa`ati Shay'un `Azimun
Yawma Tarawnaha Tadh/halu Kullu Murđi`atin `Amma 'Arđa`at Wa Tađa`u Kullu Dhati Hamlin Hamlaha Wa Tara An-Nasa Sukara Wa Ma Hum Bisukara Wa Lakinna `Adhaba Allahi Shadidun
Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Yujadilu Fi Allahi Bighayri `Ilmin Wa Yattabi`u Kulla Shaytanin Maridin
Kutiba `Alayhi 'Annahu Man Tawallahu Fa'annahu Yuđilluhu Wa Yahdihi 'Ila `Adhabi As-Sa`iri

Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu 'In Kuntum Fi Raybin Mina Al-Ba`thi Fa'inna Khalaqnakum Min Turabin Thumma Min Nutfatin Thumma Min `Alaqatin Thumma Min Muđghatin Mukhallaqatin Wa Ghayri Mukhallaqatin Linubayyina Lakum Wa Nuqirru Fi Al-'Arhami Ma Nasha'u 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Thumma Nukhrijukum Tiflaan Thumma Litablughu 'Ashuddakum Wa Minkum Man Yutawaffa Wa Minkum Man Yuraddu 'Ila 'Ardhali Al-`Umuri Likayla Ya`lama Min Ba`di `Ilmin Shay'aan Wa Tara Al-'Arđa Hamidatan Fa'idha 'Anzalna `Alayha Al-Ma'a Ahtazzat Wa Rabat Wa 'Anbatat Min Kulli Zawjin Bahijin
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Huwa Al-Haqqu Wa 'Annahu Yuhyi Al-Mawta Wa 'Annahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Wa 'Anna As-Sa`ata 'Atiyatun La Rayba Fiha Wa 'Anna Allaha Yab`athu Man Fi Al-Quburi
Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Yujadilu Fi Allahi Bighayri `Ilmin Wa La Hudaan Wa La Kitabin Munirin
Thaniya `Itfihi Liyuđilla `An Sabili Allahi Lahu Fi Ad-Dunya Khizyun Wa Nudhiquhu Yawma Al-Qiyamati `Adhaba Al-Hariqi
Dhalika Bima Qaddamat Yadaka Wa 'Anna Allaha Laysa Bizallamin Lil`abidi

Wa Mina An-Nasi Man Ya`budu Allaha `Ala Harfin Fa'in 'Asabahu Khayrun Atma'anna Bihi Wa 'In 'Asabat/hu Fitnatun Anqalaba `Ala Wajhihi Khasira Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirata Dhalika Huwa Al-Khusranu Al-Mubinu
Yad`u Min Duni Allahi Ma La Yađurruhu Wa Ma La Yanfa`uhu Dhalika Huwa Ađ-Đalalu Al-Ba`idu
Yad`u Laman Đarruhu 'Aqrabu Min Naf`ihi Labi'sa Al-Mawla Wa Labi'sa Al-`Ashiru
Inna Allaha Yudkhilu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu 'Inna Allaha Yaf`alu Ma Yuridu
Man Kana Yazunnu 'An Lan Yansurahu Allahu Fi Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirati Falyamdud Bisababin 'Ila As-Sama'i Thumma Liyaqta` Falyanzur Hal Yudh/hibanna Kayduhu Ma Yaghizu
Wa Kadhalika 'Anzalnahu 'Ayatin Bayyinatin Wa 'Anna Allaha Yahdi Man Yuridu
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa Al-Ladhina Hadu Wa As-Sabi'ina Wa An-Nasara Wa Al-Majusa Wa Al-Ladhina 'Ashraku 'Inna Allaha Yafsilu Baynahum Yawma Al-Qiyamati 'Inna Allaha `Ala Kulli Shay'in Shahidun

Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Yasjudu Lahu Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Man Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ash-Shamsu Wa Al-Qamaru Wa An-Nujumu Wa Al-Jibalu Wa Ash-Shajaru Wa Ad-Dawabbu Wa Kathirun Mina An-Nasi Wa Kathirun Haqqa `Alayhi Al-`Adhabu Wa Man Yuhini Allahu Fama Lahu Min Mukrimin 'Inna Allaha Yaf`alu Ma Yasha'u
Hadhani Khasmani Akhtasamu Fi Rabbihim Fa-Al-Ladhina Kafaru Qutti`at Lahum Thiyabun Min Narin Yusabbu Min Fawqi Ru'usihimu Al-Hamimu
Yusharu Bihi Ma Fi Butunihim Wa Al-Juludu
Wa Lahum Maqami`u Min Hadidin
Kullama 'Aradu 'An Yakhruju Minha Min Ghammin 'U`idu Fiha Wa Dhuqu `Adhaba Al-Hariqi
Inna Allaha Yudkhilu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Yuhallawna Fiha Min 'Asawira Min Dhahabin Wa Lu'ulu'uaan Wa Libasuhum Fiha Harirun
Wa Hudu 'Ila At-Tayyibi Mina Al-Qawli Wa Hudu 'Ila Sirati Al-Hamidi

Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Yasudduna `An Sabili Allahi Wa Al-Masjidi Al-Harami Al-Ladhi Ja`alnahu Lilnnasi Sawa'an Al-`Akifu Fihi Wa Al-Badi Wa Man Yurid Fihi Bi'ilhadin Bizulmin Nudhiqhu Min `Adhabin 'Alimin
Wa 'Idh Bawwa'na Li'ibrahima Makana Al-Bayti 'An La Tushrik Bi Shay'aan Wa Tahhir Baytiya Liltta'ifina Wa Al-Qa'imina Wa Ar-Rukka`i As-Sujudi
Wa 'Adhin Fi An-Nasi Bil-Hajji Ya'tuka Rijalaan Wa `Ala Kulli Đamirin Ya'tina Min Kulli Fajjin `Amiqin
Liyash/hadu Manafi`a Lahum Wa Yadhkuru Asma Allahi Fi 'Ayyamin Ma`lumatin `Ala Ma Razaqahum Min Bahimati Al-'An`am Fakulu Minha Wa 'At`imu Al-Ba'isa Al-Faqira
Thumma Liyaqđu Tafathahum Wa Liufu Nudhurahum Wa Liattawwafu Bil-Bayti Al-`Atiqi
Dhalika Wa Man Yu`azzim Hurumati Allahi Fahuwa Khayrun Lahu `Inda Rabbihi Wa 'Uhillat Lakumu Al-'An`am 'Illa Ma Yutla `Alaykum Fajtanibu Ar-Rijsa Mina Al-'Awthani Wa Ajtanibu Qawla Az-Zuri
Hunafa'a Lillahi Ghayra Mushrikina Bihi Wa Man Yushrik Billahi Faka'annama Kharra Mina As-Sama'i Fatakhtafuhu At-Tayru 'Aw Tahwi Bihi Ar-Rihu Fi Makanin Sahiqin
Dhalika Wa Man Yu`azzim Sha`a'ira Allahi Fa'innaha Min Taqwa Al-Qulubi
Lakum Fiha Manafi`u 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Thumma Mahilluha 'Ila Al-Bayti Al-`Atiqi
Wa Likulli 'Ummatin Ja`alna Mansakaan Liyadhkuru Asma Allahi `Ala Ma Razaqahum Min Bahimati Al-'An`ami Fa'ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Falahu 'Aslimu Wa Bashiri Al-Mukhbitina
Al-Ladhina 'Idha Dhukira Allahu Wajilat Qulubuhum Wa As-Sabirina `Ala Ma 'Asabahum Wa Al-Muqimi As-Salaati Wa Mimma Razaqnahum Yunfiquna

Wa Al-Budna Ja`alnaha Lakum Min Sha`a'iri Allahi Lakum Fiha Khayrun Fadhkuru Asma Allahi `Alayha Sawaffa Fa'idha Wajabat Junubuha Fakulu Minha Wa 'At`imu Al-Qani`a Wa Al-Mu`tarra Kadhalika Sakhkharnaha Lakum La`allakum Tashkuruna
Lan Yanala Allaha Luhumuha Wa La Dima'uuha Wa Lakin Yanaluhu At-Taqwa Minkum Kadhalika Sakhkharaha Lakum Litukabbiru Allaha `Ala Ma Hadakum Wa Bashiri Al-Muhsinina
Inna Allaha Yudafi`u `Ani Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Inna Allaha La Yuhibbu Kulla Khawwanin Kafurin
Udhina Lilladhina Yuqataluna Bi'annahum Zulimu Wa 'Inna Allaha `Ala Nasrihim Laqadirun

Al-Ladhina 'Ukhriju Min Diyarihim Bighayri Haqqin 'Illa 'An Yaqulu Rabbuna Allahu Wa Lawla Daf`u Allahi An-Nasa Ba`đahum Biba`đin Lahuddimat Sawami`u Wa Biya`un Wa Salawatun Wa Masajidu Yudhkaru Fiha Asmu Allahi Kathiraan Wa Layansuranna Allahu Man Yansuruhu 'Inna Allaha Laqawiyun `Azizun
Al-Ladhina 'In Makkannahum Fi Al-'Arđi 'Aqamu As-Salaata Wa 'Ataw Az-Zakaata Wa 'Amaru Bil-Ma`rufi Wa Nahaw `Ani Al-Munkari Wa Lillahi `Aqibatu Al-'Umuri
Wa 'In Yukadhibuka Faqad Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa `Adun Wa Thamudu
Wa Qawmu 'Ibrahima Wa Qawmu Lutin
Wa 'Ashabu Madyana Wa Kudhiba Musa Fa'amlaytu Lilkafirina Thumma 'Akhadhtuhum Fakayfa Kana Nakiri
Faka'ayyin Min Qaryatin 'Ahlaknaha Wa Hiya Zalimatun Fahiya Khawiyatun `Ala `Urushiha Wa Bi'rin Mu`attalatin Wa Qasrin Mashidin
Afalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fatakuna Lahum Qulubun Ya`qiluna Biha 'Aw 'Adhanun Yasma`una Biha Fa'innaha La Ta`ma Al-'Absaru Wa Lakin Ta`ma Al-Qulubu Allati Fi As-Suduri
Wa Yasta`jilunaka Bil-`Adhabi Wa Lan Yukhlifa Allahu Wa`dahu Wa 'Inna Yawmaan `Inda Rabbika Ka'alfi Sanatin Mimma Ta`udduna
Wa Ka'ayyin Min Qaryatin 'Amlaytu Laha Wa Hiya Zalimatun Thumma 'Akhadhtuha Wa 'Ilayya Al-Masiru
Qul Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu 'Innama 'Ana Lakum Nadhirun Mubinun
Fa-Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Lahum Maghfiratun Wa Rizqun Karimun
Wa Al-Ladhina Sa`aw Fi 'Ayatina Mu`ajizina 'Ula'ika 'Ashabu Al-Jahimi

Wa Ma 'Arsalna Min Qablika Min Rasulin Wa La Nabiyin 'Illa 'Idha Tamanna 'Alqa Ash-Shaytanu Fi 'Umniyatihi Fayansakhu Allahu Ma Yulqi Ash-Shaytanu Thumma Yuhkimu Allahu 'Ayatihi Wa Allahu `Alimun Hakimun
Liyaj`ala Ma Yulqi Ash-Shaytanu Fitnatan Lilladhina Fi Qulubihim Marađun Wa Al-Qasiyati Qulubuhum Wa 'Inna Az-Zalimina Lafi Shiqaqin Ba`idin
Wa Liya`lama Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma 'Annahu Al-Haqqu Min Rabbika Fayu'uminu Bihi Fatukhbita Lahu Qulubuhum Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahadi Al-Ladhina 'Amanu 'Ila Siratin Mustaqimin
Wa La Yazalu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fi Miryatin Minhu Hatta Ta'tiyahumu As-Sa`atu Baghtatan 'Aw Ya'tiyahum `Adhabu Yawmin `Aqimin
Al-Mulku Yawma'idhin Lillahi Yahkumu Baynahum Fa-Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fi Jannati An-Na`imi
Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Kadhabu Bi'ayatina Fa'ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun Muhinun
Wa Al-Ladhina Hajaru Fi Sabili Allahi Thumma Qutilu 'Aw Matu Layarzuqannahumu Allahu Rizqaan Hasanaan Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahuwa Khayru Ar-Raziqina
Layudkhilannahum Mudkhalaan Yarđawnahu Wa 'Inna Allaha La`alimun Halimun
Dhalika Wa Man `Aqaba Bimithli Ma `Uqiba Bihi Thumma Bughiya `Alayhi Layansurannahu Allahu 'Inna Allaha La`afuwun Ghafurun
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Yuliju Al-Layla Fi An-Nahari Wa Yuliju An-Nahara Fi Al-Layli Wa 'Anna Allaha Sami`un Basirun
Dhalika Bi'anna Allaha Huwa Al-Haqqu Wa 'Anna Ma Yad`una Min Dunihi Huwa Al-Batilu Wa 'Anna Allaha Huwa Al-`Aliyu Al-Kabiru
Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fatusbihu Al-'Arđu Mukhđarratan 'Inna Allaha Latifun Khabirun
Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Wa 'Inna Allaha Lahuwa Al-Ghaniyu Al-Hamidu
Alam Tara 'Anna Allaha Sakhkhara Lakum Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Al-Fulka Tajri Fi Al-Bahri Bi'amrihi Wa Yumsiku As-Sama'a 'An Taqa`a `Ala Al-'Arđi 'Illa Bi'idhnihi 'Inna Allaha Bin-Nasi Lara'ufun Rahimun
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Ahyakum Thumma Yumitukum Thumma Yuhyikum 'Inna Al-'Insana Lakafurun
Likulli 'Ummatin Ja`alna Mansakaan Hum Nasikuhu Fala Yunazi`unnaka Fi Al-'Amri Wa Ad`u 'Ila Rabbika 'Innaka La`ala Hudaan Mustaqimin
Wa 'In Jadaluka Faquli Allahu 'A`lamu Bima Ta`maluna
Allahu Yahkumu Baynakum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Fima Kuntum Fihi Takhtalifuna
Alam Ta`lam 'Anna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Fi As-Sama'i Wa Al-'Arđi 'Inna Dhalika Fi Kitabin 'Inna Dhalika `Ala Allahi Yasirun
Wa Ya`buduna Min Duni Allahi Ma Lam Yunazzil Bihi Sultanaan Wa Ma Laysa Lahum Bihi `Ilmun Wa Ma Lilzzalimina Min Nasirin

Wa 'Idha Tutla `Alayhim 'Ayatuna Bayyinatin Ta`rifu Fi Wujuhi Al-Ladhina Kafaru Al-Munkara Yakaduna Yastuna Bial-Ladhina Yatluna `Alayhim 'Ayatina Qul 'Afa'unabbi'ukum Bisharrin Min Dhalikumu An-Naru Wa`adaha Allahu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Bi'sa Al-Masiru

Ya 'Ayyuha An-Nasu Đuriba Mathalun Fastami`u Lahu 'Inna Al-Ladhina Tad`una Min Duni Allahi Lan Yakhluqu Dhubabaan Wa Lawi Ajtama`u Lahu Wa 'In Yaslubhumu Adh-Dhubabu Shay'aan La Yastanqidhuhu Minhu Đa`ufa At-Talibu Wa Al-Matlubu
Ma Qadaru Allaha Haqqa Qadrihi 'Inna Allaha Laqawiyun `Azizun
Allahu Yastafi Mina Al-Mala'ikati Rusulaan Wa Mina An-Nasi 'Inna Allaha Sami`un Basirun
Ya`lamu Ma Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Ma Khalfahum Wa 'Ila Allahi Turja`u Al-'Umuru
Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Arka`u Wa Asjudu Wa A`budu Rabbakum Wa Af`alu Al-Khayra La`allakum Tuflihuna

Wa Jahidu Fi Allahi Haqqa Jihadihi Huwa Ajtabakum Wa Ma Ja`ala `Alaykum Fi Ad-Dini Min Harajin Millata 'Abikum 'Ibrahima Huwa Sammakumu Al-Muslimyna Min Qablu Wa Fi Hadha Liyakuna Ar-Rasulu Shahidaan `Alaykum Wa Takunu Shuhada'a `Ala An-Nasi Fa'aqimu As-Salaata Wa 'Atu Az-Zakaata Wa A`tasimu Billahi Huwa Mawlakum Fani`ma Al-Mawla Wa Ni`ma An-Nasiru
